DOC.criteria: age 1869 year BMI ≥27 kg/m2 coffee consumption ≥3 cup per day new diagnose type 2 diabetes last 6 month severe disease hospital stay last 3 month change body weight 2 kg per week last 4 week smoke cessation last 3 month plan study acute infects chronical disease except type 2 diabetes mellitus regular pharmacological therapy except oral antidiabetic medication contraception lack contraception woman breastfeed physical activity 1 hour per day
